channel.title: 🏢 Inria, CNRS, IRISA on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Inria, CNRS, IRISA on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: WaterMax: breaking the LLM watermark detectability-robustness-quality trade-off
item.description: WaterMax: a novel LLM watermarking scheme achieving high detectability and preserving text quality by cleverly generating multiple texts and selecting the most suitable one.
